summary: AN ORDINANCE granting permission to PAN Western Land Co., Inc., to improve 53rd Avenue South, as platted in Knoll Wood Addition, from 379.23 feet north of the center line of Renton Avenue South, as produced from the northwest, to approximately 520.61 feet north of said center line, and a certain easement across private property; by constructing asphaltic concrete pavement, and otherwise improving the same, at its own cost and expense.
